prompt:
What advice would you give to someone starting out in a new career?
Congratulations on embarking on a fresh journey! Here are some tips to help you navigate your early days: first, get comfortable with the basics of your field; secondly, network tirelessly and form connections that can support your growth; thirdly, don't shy away from asking questions – curiosity fuels learning; and fourth, never forget about self-care: ensure proper rest, nutrition, and exercise to sustain energy.
